meanings.definition: A type of lettuce with long, crisp leaves.
meanings.sent1: I made a delicious salad with romaine for dinner.
meanings.sent2: My favorite salad includes romaine lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumbers.
meanings.sent3: Why did the romaine lettuce go to the dance? It wanted to be the coolest leaf in town!
meanings.sent4: The romaine leaves stood tall in the garden, like soldiers ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of romaine lettuce in a salad adds a refreshing texture.

meanings.definition: A variety of lettuce with a mild flavor.
meanings.sent1: She prefers the taste of romaine over other types of lettuce.
meanings.sent2: The sandwich was filled with turkey, cheese, and a few leaves of romaine.
meanings.sent3: Why did the romaine lettuce break up with the iceberg lettuce? It needed some space to grow.
meanings.sent4: The romaine lettuce whispered secrets to the other vegetables in the fridge.
meanings.sent5: The gentle flavor of romaine lettuce complemented the tangy dressing perfectly.
